name: GameFAQs v11 Prism
description:
This CSS makes heavy use of CSS3 properties. Firefox 3.5+ is recommended.

Default Preview (with GameFOX essentials and GameFOX Ad Blocking active):
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/386823/GameFAQs/prism/GameFAQs-T-%20Blood%20Money_1289151984964.png

And with a few simple value changes:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/386823/GameFAQs/prism/GameFAQs-T-%20Blood%20Money_1289152081104.png
additional_info:
How to use:
1. Use any of the "Default *" styles. (http://www.gamefaqs.com/user/site.html)
2. Change the hex values under "/*========== STATIC COLORS ==========*/" to your liking.
3. Enjoy.

To Do:

The new layouts.
